channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: Inflation heats up in June as President Trump's tariffs start to bite
item.description: Consumer prices were up 2.7% from a year ago — a larger annual increase than the month before.

item.title: Thousands of Afghans were moved to UK in secret scheme after data breach

item.title: A Florida county leads the way with a high-tech 911 system that improves emergency response
item.description: Collier County, Florida, uses one of the most advanced 911 systems in the U.S., allowing callers to send texts and videos.

item.description: The Israeli military said it had struck a number of military compounds belonging to the armed group Hezbollah.

item.title: Two dead after flash flooding in New Jersey and New York City

item.title: How do you stop an AI model from turning Nazi? What the Grok drama reveals.
item.description: The latest Grok controversy is revealing not for the extremist outputs, but for how it exposes a fundamental dishonesty in AI development.
